PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_DeviceAnnceReq_t Struct Reference

This request is used to notify other ZigBee devices that a device has joined or re-joined the network, identifying the devices 64-bit IEEE address and new 16-bit NWK address, and informing the remote devices of the capability of the ZigBee device. This command is invoked for all ZigBee end devices upon join or rejoin. This command may also be invoked by ZigBee routers upon join or rejoin as part of NWK address conflict resolution. The destination addressing on this primitive is broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle equals true. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrLocal
 NWK address for the Local Device.
ExtAddr_t ieeeAddrLocal
 IEEE address for the Local Device.
MAC_CapabilityInf_t macCapability
 Capability of the local device.

Detailed Description

This request is used to notify other ZigBee devices that a device has joined or re-joined the network, identifying the devices 64-bit IEEE address and new 16-bit NWK address, and informing the remote devices of the capability of the ZigBee device. This command is invoked for all ZigBee end devices upon join or rejoin. This command may also be invoked by ZigBee routers upon join or rejoin as part of NWK address conflict resolution. The destination addressing on this primitive is broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle equals true.
